main event: A mysterious flying object was reported over the Carolinas on December 28, 1949, resembling a balloon or blimp, with numerous witnesses describing its flight.
interesting points: The object was first sighted at Fayetteville, NC, around 4:30 p.m. and was reported seen in multiple locations within a half-hour, It was viewed by various residents, including pilots, who described it hovering and moving in different directions, One observer claimed to see something resembling a man drop from the craft, The object reportedly traveled for approximately 200 miles in a straight line, The sightings sparked widespread speculation and reports of unexplained aerial phenomena in the area.
sighted object: unidentified flying object resembling a balloon or blimp
witness description: business and professional men, housewives, trained pilots, a city policeman, and a mayor.
